name: BT Human Posing Guide
description:
Just a simple proportionate human posing doll. It's a little weird to use but it will surely help you get a better grasp of where you need to be drawing in this 3D space! Have fun!

- To use this guide use the select tool and select the bone you would like to move. 

- Suggested limb movement: Select all 3 limb bones at once and pose from the torso out.

- Each limb can be moved at the connecting joint to the torso, knee/elbow, and wrist/ankle.

- The head can also be moved and connects to the torso at the bottom of the neck.
